alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; Drew; Lincoln (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 5:29PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Cleveland, northwestern Drew and southwestern Lincoln Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 529 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Plantersville, or 9 miles southwest of Star City, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Monticello... Plantersville... Brandon... Garnett... Montongo... Cornerville... Pansy... Florence... Rock Springs... Coleman... Tyro... Relfs Bluff... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
